title: Does my phone support FM radio? How do I manually search for channels and save them on my phone?
answer:
Your phone supports FM radio. Insert the headset before using the FM radio. The headset will be used as an antenna. 

 On the **FM Radio** screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45392) > **Station list** > ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45393) > **Keep favorite stations/Clear favorite stations**. Inputting a specific channel is not supported. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45394) 

 On the **FM Radio** screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45395) > **Station list** > ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45396). When ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45397) turns to ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45398), the channel is added to the favorites. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45399)
